short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate your browser like a pro with just a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Command Bar is designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your browsing experience. 

With just a few keystrokes (Ctrl+K or Cmd+K on Mac), you can access a wide range of browser functions and popular websites. 

Navigate through the command list and hit Enter to execute your chosen action, all without touching your mouse. 

Whether you need to open a new tab or incognito window, access browser settings or developer tools, or visit your favourite websites like GitHub, ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, or YouTube, everything is just a Cmd+K away.

How It Works

a. Install the Chrome Command Bar extension.

b. Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to open the command palette.

c. Start typing to filter the command list.

d. Use the arrow keys to navigate and Enter to execute a command.
